text: Ciṟaiyilirukkum eṉ iru tōḻarkaḷē! (Uṅkaḷ kaṉavukaḷiṉ palaṉkaḷāvaṉa) uṅkaḷiruvaril oruvar tam ejamāṉaṉukku tirāṭcai matuvaip pukaṭṭik koṇṭiruppār; maṟṟavarō ciluvaiyil aṟaiyappaṭṭu, avar talaiyiliruntu paṟavaikaḷ kottit tiṉṉum; nīṅkaḷiruvarum viḷakkam kōriya kāriyam (kaṉaviṉ palaṉ) vitikkappaṭṭuviṭṭatu" (eṉṟu yūsuḥp kūṟiṉār)
